premium.purchaseSuccess: You are now a Premium member. Enjoy unlimited access to all features.
premium.subtitle: Take your health journey to the next level

features.aiInsightsDesc: Analyze your drinking habits with deep learning.
features.appleHealthDesc: Sync your data across all your devices.
features.badgesDesc: 12+ rare badges exclusive to Premium members.
features.remindersDesc: Notifications fully adapted to weather and biorhythm.
features.themesDesc: 5 new color palettes and custom app icons.
features.reportsDesc: Weekly, monthly PDF and detailed CSV reports.
features.plantDesc: Grow a plant that blooms as you drink water.

premium.footer: You can cancel anytime. Payments are charged through your Google Play Store / App Store account.

settings.title: Settings
settings.personalizedGoalDesc: Calculate your recommended daily water goal based on weight, age and activity level.
settings.dailyGoalDesc: How much water do you want to drink daily?
settings.aiDesc: Optimize your water drinking habits with AI-powered features.
settings.smartGoalEngineDesc: AI adjusts your goals and reminders throughout the day based on your activity and weather.
settings.smartReminderDesc: Smart reminders optimize your drinking times based on your daily activity and weather.
settings.dailySummaryDesc: Get your daily water consumption summary at your set time.
settings.weeklyReportDesc: Get your weekly water consumption report on your set day and time.
settings.biorhythmDesc: Biorhythm adjusts your drinking schedule based on your wake and sleep times.
settings.detoxDesc: Detox mode encourages you to drink more water to cleanse your body.
settings.autoNightModeDesc: Automatically switches between dark/light mode based on system settings.
settings.appleHealthDesc: Sync your water consumption data with Apple Health.
settings.dynamicGoalDesc: Automatically adjust your water goal based on daily calories burned.
settings.dataExportDesc: Export your water consumption data as professional reports.
settings.resetCompleteMessage: App onboarding screen has been reset.
